segments.text: Of course , just five minutes ago I got the phone call from Future Clothes Company and I was told to start my trial period in that company next Monday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I am worried to death right now ! There is still no news from the company for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let it be ! Time will tell .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe they will send me e-mail to inform the result . Let me check my mail-box again .
segments.speaker: S1
